```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(BNPvegan)
```

```{r}
object <- sdm(Lepidoptera)
BNPvegan::coverage.sdm(fit)
fitpy <- ssm(Lepidoptera, model = "PY")

summary(fitpy)
summary(fit)


extrapolation(fit, m = 10000)

plot(fit, type = "extrapolation", m = 10000)

extrapolation(fitpy, m = c(10, 20))
```
```{r}
a = sample_Kinf(object, n_samples = 100)

```
